metadata.title: CVE-2021-47437 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: adis16475: fix deadlock on frequency setWith commit 39c024b51b560("iio: adis16475: improve sync scale mode handling"), two deadlocks wereintroduced: 1) The call to 'adis_write_reg_16()' was not changed to it's unlocked    version. 2) The lock was not being released on the success path of the function.This change fixes both these issues.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
